name: BumpyBall.io
description:
Bumpy Ball is online team based physics car soccer.  Drop in and out of 3v3 online matches.  

How to Play BumpyBall.io

The objective in BumpyBall.io is similar to Soccer, get as many goals on the opposing team as possible. 

W - to accelerate
S - for reverse
AD - to steer
SPACE - To boost

BumpyBall.io Strategy

Passing the ball is the most effective way to move it quicky down the field.  Try boosting right before hitting the ball to give it some extra 'kick'.
